creator: n.schmitt@scaet.de
text:
The task throws an NP at 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.extension.Extension.getListed
(Extension.java:660)
,if the jar library does not contain a manifest.
The very reason is a bug in ExtensionUtil.getManifest( file ):
Line 255 = "return jarFile.getManifest();"
-> premature exit, even if manifest is null

Created attachment 6106
Enhanced method getManifest to throw when Manifest == null
creator: n.schmitt@scaet.de
